pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, January 17, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Windsor, Ontario

Private meetings

11:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with university students.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will tour an automotive assembly plant and meet with workers.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled coverage

3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media scrum.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
